extDescr.message: Session manager and tabs saver. With sync

p_overwriteGroup_popup.message: The group with the same name already exists. Do you want overwrite old one with current tabs?

p_quotaBitesPerItem_error.message: Can't save to sync storage. Too many tabs. Try to close one more.

p_quotaBites_error.message: Sync storage is full. Del unused groups.

p_syncStorageDefault_error.message: Sync storage error. Try again later.

o_tabs_help.description: Tab name. Prefix 'o_' for options page

o_help_syncStorage.message: Tab Groups are stored in the sync storage. Sign in to browser to get them on other PC.

o_help_syncStorage_1.message: Sync storage is limited in size. You can see storage usage (No.1 on the screenshot).

o_help_syncStorage_2.message: There is also a limit on the size of the recorded data at a time. It is approximately 17 - 24 tabs.

o_help_quickAdd.message: To quickly save all open tabs in a group, just open extension window and press 'ENTER'.

o_help_showLinks.message: To view tabs in saved group click on gray triangle (No.2 on the  screenshot)

o_help_inNewWindow.message: 'Ctrl + click' on group name (or session) will open it in a new window. Or click on the icon next to the group name (No.3 on the  screenshot)

o_help_editGroup.message: You can edit, delete, change position for every saved group  (No.4 on the  screenshot)

o_help_overFavicon.message: Place mouse pointer over favicon to view url of tab.

o_sessionWatcher_toggle.message: Watch sessions. Unchecked will disable the automatic session saving. Extension will reload automatically!!!

o_backup_backupInstruction.message: Copy text from text area below (CTRL+A to select whole text and CTRL+C to copy). Then past (CTRL+V) and save text in a file. For example TabHamsterBackup.txt. Use UTF-8 encoding for this file.

o_backup_backupInstructionMore.message: You will be able to use this data to restore your saved groups and extension options. You cannot restore sessions.

o_backup_restoreInstruction.message: Past your previously saved backup in this text area. Make sure that you past UTF-8 encoded text. Then press 'Restore...' button. Extension will be automatically restarted.

o_backup_restoreInstructionMore.message: Attention! All your currently saved groups and options will be erased.
